thread.title: Watch: Beyonce's dad reckons 'she's the exact same age' as Pink - making her older

author: Sheena McGinley
title: Watch: Beyonce's dad reckons 'she's the exact same age' as Pink - making her older
text:
EXTRA, EXTRA, PERSON IN HOLLYWOOD SAYS THEY'RE TWO YEARS YOUNGER THAN THEY POSSIBLY MIGHT BE - HAS SHOWBIZ AGE! In other words, it shouldn't be "news" but it's everywhere. Mainly because Matthew Knowles can't keep it zipped. And we're not referring to the reported love child , but rather Mr Knowles allegedly suggesting that Beyonce and Jay Z fuelled divorce speculation to sell concert tickets.
Speaking during a recent interview, Beyonce's father - who she let go as her manager some time back - mentioned in passing that she is the exact same age as Pink - who is 36. Beyonce says she is 34.
Between this "shocking revelation" and her dressing down of an earnest aide , it's been quite the week for Beyonce.
